text:
Hey...  What do you think, Producer?
Does this look good on me?

It suits you perfectly.
You look like a lovely bride.

Hehe~...
Thank you, I'm feeling more confident now!
It's rare for you to say something like that, Kogane.

Weren't you going to make me think,
"There's no one better for a bride role"?

I wouldn't say this for just any job. But for a bride, you
want your partner who sees you in the dress to think──

That's why...
I just wanted to hear it.

You want to bring that feeling to do a good job, huh?
Yes, you're the world's best bride, Kogane...!

Hehe~, Right Right~?!
I'm going to do a great job, so watch me~!
